hooks.command: claudemol status 2>/dev/null || (python_path=$(python3 -c "import json,pathlib; c=json.loads(pathlib.Path.home().joinpath('.claudemol','config.json').read_text()); print(c['python_path'])" 2>/dev/null) && "$python_path" -m claudemol.cli status 2>/dev/null) || echo 'claudemol not installed or PyMOL not running'
